description: A black and white cat is lying on a bed in a living room, occasionally shifting position and gazing around. The camera gradually zooms in on the cat's face, capturing its attentive gaze and relaxed posture.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A cat is lying on the floor and the cabinet is stationary, so it is more natural to say the cat is in front of the cabinet rather than the cabinet in front of the cat.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: The drawer is part of the cabinet and not lying next to it; flipping subject/object correctly represents the drawer lying inside or part of the cabinet.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped
